welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Carrollton, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its friendly community and beautiful parks, we invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves mainly domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at James Cox Dayton International Airport serves mainly domestic flights operated by American Airlines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to 'DAY Airport WiFi' network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including dining options, restrooms, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Clinton Field Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary departure area for domestic flights at Clinton Field Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the primary departure area for international flights at Clinton Field Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
